entity.name: Ecocee
entity.description: Ecocee is a startup founded by Sreeraj V Rajesh, building AI and embedded system solutions. Our mission combines open-source contributions (like KuttAI) with custom product development for customers, creating scalable tools and solutions. Currently, we are operating with zero revenue and very limited hardware (Intel 4th-gen laptop, 4GB RAM). We are seeking one-time support to purchase a high-performance laptop (MacBook Pro or RTX series laptop) to accelerate the development of both open-source projects and customer-focused products that benefit students, industries, and developers worldwide.

projects.name: KuttAI
projects.description: KuttAI is a beautiful, modern command-line interface AI chatbot designed specifically for KTU students. With its stunning gradient-colored interface and powerful AI capabilities, KuttAI provides intelligent assistance for studies, exams, and all things related to the KTU ecosystem.

channels.description: Support Ecocee directly via UPI to help us purchase a development laptop.

plans.name: Laptop Upgrade Fund
plans.description: One-time support to purchase a high-performance laptop (Apple MacBook Pro or RTX-based laptop). This hardware will power the development of multiple AI and embedded projects under Ecocee.

history.description: Ecocee is in early stage with no funding or revenue. Current development happens on limited hardware.
